notes:
### v1.4.13
#### BUG FIXES
- adjusted hp bar color for shielded bosses (win11)
- added missing buff icons

### v1.4.11
#### NEW FEATURES
- new update popup (wow so cool!)
- boss hp bar will now show shields if the boss is shielded (added in preparation of hell brel g6 7x mech)

![shield](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/220646943498567680/1191979350157959210/image.png)
#### BUG FIXES
- fix local player cache causing crashes

### v1.4.10
#### NEW FEATURES
- hovering skills now show tripod info

![hovering skills](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/220646943498567680/1189022385702182921/image.png)
#### BUG FIXES
- fix tripods for certain skills not being tracked

full patch notes on [github](https://github.com/snoww/loa-logs/releases/latest)

send bug reports/suggestions to [#loa-logs](https://discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5)
